description.text: This submodule is for representing network services hosted in network devices.

reference.text: RFC 7950 - The YANG 1.1 Data Modeling Language

description.text: The SouthboundService inherits from the NetDevService and includes properties and methods to handle the communication through the SBIs
Indicates that NetDev services cooperate with or are required for other NetDev services to perform their functions
This relationship allows the NetDevServiceSettings class describing the configuration parameters of services hosted in NetDevs
Indicates the preference for processing a group of services hosted by a NetDev.
